Business or Service Point - Types¶

This section defines various type classes of market.models.BusinessServicePoint.

class market.bsp_types.BaseBspType(_obj=None, **kwargs)¶

Base BSP type or establishment definitation. Always inherit this class to define any further BSP type.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

classmethod type_cast_value(label, value)¶

Method to type cast value as per label property data type.

Parameters:
  • label – Attribute label
  • value – Value of the attribute
Returns:

Type casted value
class market.bsp_types.BspTypes¶

Enum class that defines various types of business and Service points. These are fundamental types and not categories.

Add new type in the system:

  • Create type enum in this class and add to choices keepng the order.
  • Create new BSP type class by extending market.bsp_types.BaseBspType
  • Add mapping in MAPPING_BSP_CLASS
  • Create bsp edit partial in directory and as: market/templates/market/partials/bsp_types/<bsp_type_code>_attributes.html

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

class market.bsp_types.Cafe(_obj=None, **kwargs)¶

A cafe, or coffeehouse is a small restaurant serving coffee, beverages, and light meals.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

class market.bsp_types.PaymentMethods¶

Enum class for payment methods.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

class market.bsp_types.Restaurant(_obj=None, **kwargs)¶

Eatery is any point offering food or drink service in any form and type.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh
